scripts.install:all: npm install && cd main-app && npm install && cd ../music-library && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "cd main-app && npm start" "cd music-library && npm start"
scripts.build: npm run build:music-library && npm run build:main-app
scripts.serve: concurrently "cd main-app && npm run serve:dist" "cd music-library && npm run serve:dist"
